string-array.name: intro_text
string-array.item: This app is one of the examples of usage Cicerone, Moxy, Toothpick
Cicerone is a lightweight library that makes the navigation in an Android app easy.
Moxy is a library that helps to use MVP pattern when you do the Android Application. Without problems of lifecycle and boilerplate code!
Toothpick is a scope tree based Dependency Injection (DI) library for Java.
